name: Growth Circles
description:
Growth Circles

Project for the 2022 GameDevTV Game Jam.

You are a small fungus looking to liberate his land from the usurper that took your rightful home.

WASD to move, mouse to aim and left click to attack. ESC to open pause menu.

Try to kill enemies close to each other so that their bodies nurture the soil and lead to better upgrades!

Environment Art by https://szadiart.itch.io/rogue-fantasy-catacombs

Music by https://opengameart.org/users/nene
